channel.title: 2 Questions... (About A 508 Server)
channel.description:
I have 2 questions...
1. This one is about my problems making commands. I have several command generators and I tried all of them. What I want to do is make a command so when you type ::gnomecopter you get a gnomecopter (mods+). Well it wouldn't work at first (I kept getting compiling errors) so I did some research about the error I was getting (class, interface, or enum expected error) and found out what alot of people did to fix that was put // in front of it. So I put // in front of both lines of my command. The compiler worked, but sadly, the command still won't work. Any ideas of what I did wrong?
2. I recently found out 508 servers don't have client.java files (sorry I'm new to coding..DON'T MAKE FUN OF ME!!! :P) So now I'm lost of where I put shop/npc/object etc. files. All I have about shops is "Shopbuyconfig" (Java File) and "Shopbuyconfig.class" (Class File) Where do I put shop/npc/object files?
Thanks!

item.title: 2 Questions... (About A 508 Server)
item.dc:creator: @logan6305 logan6305
item.description:
@logan6305 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:2, topic:336104”]1. When you use ‘//’ it will cancell out everything on the same line AFTER it, thats why it aint working… just post your normal error here
2. Um in 508 packaging it is more contructed towards sexyness… look somewhere in data it has objectspawn.cfg or some crap[/quote]

I looked in bin\data and found objects (CFG File) but there’s nothing at all in it, just a blank document.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions... (About A 508 Server)
item.dc:creator: @logan6305 logan6305
item.description:
@logan6305 wrote:

I have 2 questions…

  1. This one is about my problems making commands. I have several command generators and I tried all of them. What I want to do is make a command so when you type ::gnomecopter you get a gnomecopter (mods+). Well it wouldn’t work at first (I kept getting compiling errors) so I did some research about the error I was getting (class, interface, or enum expected error) and found out what alot of people did to fix that was put // in front of it. So I put // in front of both lines of my command. The compiler worked, but sadly, the command still won’t work. Any ideas of what I did wrong?

  2. I recently found out 508 servers don’t have client.java files (sorry I’m new to coding…DON’T MAKE FUN OF ME!!! :P) So now I’m lost of where I put shop/npc/object etc. files. All I have about shops is “Shopbuyconfig” (Java File) and “Shopbuyconfig.class” (Class File) Where do I put shop/npc/object files?

Thanks!
